Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This unique offering is worth significantly more than its face value, reflecting its high-quality craftsmanship and exclusive features. I am extending this opportunity to you with an offer of $15000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and the benefits it will bring to you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
